Repository Name Unauthorized: Lawrence E. Will Museum of the Glades
Notes: To preserve, exhibit, and provide educational programs about the history, cultural heritage, geology and geography, ecology and economy of the geographical region of Florida that centers around the southeastern shores of Lake Okeechobee, especially the western section of Palm Beach County.Explores the “total multifaceted Glades experience.”  that is part of that vast River of Grass that sustains the Everglades.
